text: Marmande is a commune in southwestern France, in the region of Nouvelle- Aquitaine. It is a sub-prefecture of the Lot-et-Garonne department, capital of the arrondissement of Marmande. It is also the capital of 2 cantons in the department: Marmande-1 and Marmande-2. ==Geography== Marmande is on the right side of the Garonne river, at about to the northwest of Agen and to the southeast of Bordeaux. It has an area of and its average altitude is ; at the city hall, the altitude is . Marmande and its neighboring communes Marmande is surrounded by the communes Beaupuy, Mauvezin-sur-Gupie, Escassefort, Virazeil, Saint-Pardoux-du-Breuil, Fourques-sur-Garonne, Montpouillan, Gaujac and Sainte-Bazeille. ===Climate=== The climate of Marmande is an oceanic climate (Köppen climate classification Cfb), with mild winters and warm summers. ==Population== The inhabitants of Marmande are known, in French, as Marmandais (women: Marmandaises). With a population of 17,748, Marmande has a population density of inhabitants/km2. It is also the capital of the arrondissement of Marmande and the administrative centre () of 2 cantons: # Marmande-1, formed with a part of Marmande and nine other communes, with 18,503 inhabitants (2014). # Marmande-2, formed with a part of Marmande and ten other communes, with 17,833 inhabitants (2014). It is part of the intercommunality Val de Garonne (). === Twin towns === Marmande is twinned with: * Ejea de los Caballeros, Spain * Portogruaro, Italy ==Monuments and sites== * Église Notre-Dame de Marmande : Our Lady church and cloister built on the 13th century. * Jardin du Cloître de Notre-Dame de Garonne (Garden of the Cloister of Our Lady of Garonne). ==Gallery== File:Marmande Église Notre- Dame 04.jpg|Notre-Dame de Marmande. File:Marmande Hôtel de ville.jpg|Marmande town hall. ==Related pages== * Arrondissement of Marmande * Communes of the Lot-et-Garonne department ==References== ==Other websites== * Ville Marmande - Official site * Departamental Council of Lot-et-Garonne * Prefecture official website * Région Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:Subprefectures in France Category:Communes in Lot-et-Garonne
